full_text:
BB Stops are simply Parabolic stops originating at the lower Bollinger Envelope for long positions or at the upper Bollinger Envelope for short positions.

Parabolic and BB Stops increment every period, while Chandelier Stops increment only with trade progress.
2 of 4
name: John Bollinger

full_text: Chandelier Stops are quite simple. For a long position the stop is the highest high since entry less n times the m-day average true range where n usually equals three and m usually equals 10.\n3 of 4
